idea:
COMPANYâ€™S PROFILE

 

Timmaz Enterprises specialises in civil engineering works, addition and alteration works, upgrading works, design & build projects and property development along with furniture and electrical works .

 

We have been active in most aspects of the construction industry. The company has worked on many projects, and these include building and civil engineering projects by architects, private developers and home owners.

 

We recognise quality and safety as an integral part of our construction, electrical and furniture business. We are commitment to continuously provide the best services and also to deliver high quality standards to our customers. We are registered under MSME.

 

It is also our policy to ensure timely handover, minimise defects and material wastage, maintain a safe and healthy working environment, and to provide constant training to our staff so as to improve their level of workmanship.

 

We, at Timmaz will continuously strive towards 100% customer satisfaction in all aspects such as cost, efficiency and quality.
name: TIMMAZ ENTERPRISES
